CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Long-Haul Trucks relative to Hybrid Fleets?
SRP.A: Long-Haul Trucks is {above} Hybrid Fleets in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Drone Swarms relative to Cargo Planes?
SRP.A: Drone Swarms is {below} Cargo Planes in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Long-Haul Trucks relative to Cargo Planes?
SRP.A: Long-Haul Trucks is {below} Cargo Planes in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fuel consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Long-Haul Trucks}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fuel consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Hybrid Fleets}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Drone Swarms's minimum Fuel Consumption in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Drone Swarms's minimum Fuel Consumption is in {2010}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Long-Haul Trucks's maximum Fuel Consumption in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Long-Haul Trucks's maximum Fuel Consumption is in {2013}.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2007, was the average total Fuel Consumption higher or lower than between 2013 and 2015?
NC.A: The average total fuel consumption between 2005 and 2007 was {higher} than between 2013 and 2015.

NC.Q: Between 2010 and 2015, was the average total Fuel Consumption higher or lower than between 2012 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total fuel consumption between 2010 and 2015 was {higher} than between 2012 and 2014.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2013, was the average total Fuel Consumption higher or lower than between 2009 and 2011?
NC.A: The average total fuel consumption between 2007 and 2013 was {lower} than between 2009 and 2011.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2010, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 2010 and 2014?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 2008 and 2010 was {smaller} than between 2010 and 2014.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Long-Haul Trucks} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Hybrid Fleets and Long-Haul Trucks first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Hybrid Fleets and Long-Haul Trucks first exchanged leading positions in {2006}.
